blogPost.excerpt: "The quality of our relationships determines the quality of our lives." -Esther Perel Call Your Friends helps you develop the habits and skills to build closer connections with friends and family through simple text reminders.
blogPost.body: "The quality of our relationships determines the quality of our lives." -Esther Perel Call Your Friends helps you develop the habits and skills to build closer connections with friends and family through simple text reminders.
blogPost.title: Call Your Friends - Dramatically raise the quality of your friendships.
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: "我们的关系质量决定了我们生活的质量。" --Esther Perel《给你的朋友打电话》帮助你养成通过简单的文字提醒与朋友和家人建立更紧密联系的习惯和技能。
localize.tagline: 大幅提升你的友谊质量。

localize.description: "我們的關係質量決定了我們生活的質量。" --Esther Perel《給你的朋友打電話》幫助你養成通過簡單的文字提醒與朋友和家人建立更緊密聯繫的習慣和技能。
localize.tagline: 大幅提升你的友誼質量。

previous.excerpt: Repeat is a productivity app with content and guidance for those of us just getting started and flexible options for the pros. There are no subscriptions, no ads and no selling your data.
previous.title: Repeat - A simple but powerful habit tracker with no subscriptions

localize.description: Repeat是一款生产力应用，为我们这些刚入门的人提供了内容和指导，为专业人员提供了灵活的选择。没有订阅，没有广告，也没有出售你的数据。
localize.tagline: 一个简单而强大的习惯追踪器，无需订阅。

localize.description: Repeat是一款生產力應用，爲我們這些剛入門的人提供了內容和指導，爲專業人員提供了靈活的選擇。沒有訂閱，沒有廣告，也沒有出售你的數據。
localize.tagline: 一個簡單而強大的習慣追蹤器，無需訂閱。

next.excerpt: Offline access to all Pinboard bookmarks. Filter with smart collections. Share extension, drag-and-drop, Shortcuts app. Widgets, Spotlight search, Handoff, multitasking.
next.title: Pins for Pinboard - Modern iOS/macOS Pinboard app for 2021

localize.description: 离线访问所有 Pinboard 书签。使用智能收藏进行过滤。分享扩展、拖放、快捷方式应用。小工具、Spotlight 搜索、Handoff、多任务处理。
離線訪問所有 Pinboard 書籤。使用智能收藏進行過濾。分享擴展、拖放、快捷方式應用。小工具、Spotlight 搜索、Handoff、多任務處理。
